creditline: Gift of funds from Mrs. Eunice Dwan
description: cup decorated with painted design of steamboat "Ruth"; 4 figures on boat; 4 figures on shore, one fishing; gold leaf sprays, text and gold edging at foot, rim, heandle and interior bottom; saucer decorated with gold leaf sprays, rims and initials
marks:
Signature, Date and Inscription

on bottom of cu below image on cup, LRC, in brown: [R. T. Lux. N.O
title: Cup and Saucer
